Multimodal processing, symbolic versus sub symbolic probabilistic inference, and so on that won't be explored in detail at this meeting, but it will form the subject of one of our four thematic program and Nick Cater, who's joined as a sort of.
Team cognitive scientists will be sort of heading up that program.
The other sort of core challenge that was identified in the proposal but doesn't form the subject of a thematic program is the issues of scaleability and rollout of adaptive systems technology.
So the aim to develop more plug and play solutions that can scale to very large data processing tasks may be the production of embedded software development and so on.
So we're looking towards the end of the project where we might be able to deliver on this, but I think you know a lot of the ideas of the.
